title: Cross entropy Loss : Ignore list of indexes
body_html:
🚀 Feature

Generalize ignore_index to list of indexes instead of single index for the cross entropy loss.

Motivation

I would like to ignore several classes during training.

Alternatives

Right now I am assigning a weight = 0 to the classes I want to ignore during training.
Is it equivalent to ignore_index over the list of indexes I want to ignore?
